front.title: Using approximate authentication with Secure Real-time Transport Protocol (SRTP)

abstract.t: This document describes how to use an approximate authenticationalgorithm in the Secure Real-time Transport Protocol (SRTP) toprovide integrity protection for the Real-time Transport Protocol(RTP) traffic.Approximate authentication is a class of authentication algorithmswhere the authentication does not require the exact match of thesource and received data, but a parameter given, certain amount ofdeviation is acceptable.
